heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly cloudy, except partly cloudy southeast. A rising chance of showers near and north of Route 4, except likely from the northern Greens westward, chance south of Route 4; snow showers possible over the northern mountain summits. Valley highs in the mid to upper 50s for southeastern valleys, upper 40s to mid 50s elsewhere. South to southwest winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Partly cloudy in southern valleys. Periods of clouds north and in the southern Greens, with the chance of showers, with snow or a mix over the mountain summits. Lows from the mid 30s to around 40, except low to mid 40s near Lake Champlain. Winds becoming west 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Friday
text: Partly cloudy southeast, with the slight chance of a shower, otherwise mostly cloudy with scattered showers of valley rain, and of snow or wintry mix over the mountain summits. Valley highs from the mid 40s to around 50 north, and low to mid 50s in the south. West winds 5 to 15 mph.
